titles.title: JCAT Authorization Act
To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to reauthorize and rename the Interagency Threat Assessment and Coordination Group as the Joint Counterterrorism Assessment Team.

bill.summary:
Joint Counterterrorism Assessment Team Authorization Act or the JCAT Authorization Act
This bill reauthorizes for FY2020-FY2025 the Interagency Threat Assessment and Coordination Group and renames the group the Joint Counterterrorism Assessment Team.
